medical_history.chief_complaint: Bilateral multiple lung nodules and multiple thyroid nodules found during routine examination.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms were first noted in November 2012, with surveillance from November 2012 to April 2016 showing 166 nodules in the lungs, measuring 2 to 17mm in diameter. One of the largest lesions in the left upper lobe became progressively solid.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Underwent subtotal thyroidectomy for papillary cancer of thyroid in November 2012; no recurrence detected.
medical_history.family_history: Sister and niece with lung cancer.
medical_history.social_history: Patient has never smoked cigarettes, and has neither drug nor alcohol addiction.
